Final Project
New purchase Enter the amount of gas (L): Enter the price of gas ($): Add Purchase Delete Save Changes Purchase Analysis
By: Jinda Xu 
 版本：1.0
Add, edit or delete gas purchases!


 1. To add a new purchase, click on the "New Purchase Button".
 2.An automatic timestamp is created for each new purchase. 
 3.You can edit your gas purchase by selecting the purchase from the menu.
 4.You can delete your gas purchase by first clicking on the gas purchase you want to remove, then press the "Delete" button.
 5.You can obtain an overview of your gas purchases by clicking on the "Purchase Analysis" button. It will tell you the average gas price you spent last month, how much gas in liters you bought last month, and also how much gas you have bought each month.

Activity version: Food Nutrition information tracker V1.0

Things the user needs to know:

 1. This activity supports chinese version.
 2. Fragments show in yellow background.
 3. Tablet mode is available(turn screen).
 3. Active other activities from toolbar.
 4. Listview is sorted by time(latest to earliest).
 5. Click listview for more details.
 6. Click Add A Food Item button to add a new info.
 7. Click Calories(avg) button for Calories eaten per day.
 8: Click Calories(sum) button for Calories eaten yesterday.
 9. Find out more details by clicking floating action button in fragment. User Guideline To store, update or delete records:

 1. Please fill out all empty fields.

 2. Food Item field must and only contain letters.

 3. Fields for Calories, Fat and Carbohydrate are numbers only.

Information will store into a database and can be used for calculation and future analysis purposes.

Click Delete button to delete current existing data.

Cancel button allows you to go back to previous activity without saving. Go back without Saving?  In the next activity you can change

 or by choosing different options.
 After you are satisfied with your choice

 and you will return back to this screen
 where you will see the changes.
 If you enter a duplicate entry, you will
 be asked to confirm your choice by an Alert

Calculation of activity (in minutes) Per month: Last month (
Author: HUAMING CAI

Version Number: 1.0.0

This is an Activity Tracking. In the bottom tool bar of this interface, there are four buttons to operate this activity tracking. From left to right, the first button is designed to add a new activity tracking. The second button is used to list all activity tracking. User can select one of them to edit or delete it. These activity tracking can also be sorted by clicking "SORT BY TIME" button and summarized daily by clicking "DAILY SUMMARY" button. The third button is used to calculate minutes of activity the user does per month and last month. The fourth button is for help information.

The second language is Simplified Chinese.

On the top tool bar, three buttons are used to bring a user to other three activities.
Close Info>
